column5:
Fix link to the npm client repository (#69)

The npm CLI repo moved to https://github.com/npm/cli
Update the issue tracker support URL

Fix link to `Writing small modules` article

Fixes #68
Add info about npm lifecycle scripts (#67)

Replace empty bullet point in contributing.md (#63)

Replace with a horizontal rule.
Add npm-introspect as a sublist of npms (#60)
Add tip about installing Git dependencies with semver (#57)
Add a couple of tips for using `npx` (#56)

Update --save tip for npm 5 (#53)

* Update --save tip

Changed in npm 5

* Update readme.md

* Update readme.md

Remove `npm install --save` shortcuts

It's now the default in npm 5

Update info about `pnpm` (#51)

pnpm is more popular currently than `ied`, so moved one position up.

Updated the URL to pnpm as it has been moved to an org.

Updated the description of pnpm with the up to date description
Add alias to list global modules (#46)

Fix link to package.json properties exposure (#37)

Link to npm docs about package.json properties exposure had an errant hyphen.

Merge pull request #31 from kevgathuku/npm-aliases

Add npm install aliases

Add npm aliases

Add aliases for installing and saving packages to dependencies and
devDependencies

Add john

replace instances of 'a npm' with 'an npm'
add tip about npm exposing package.json properties in run scripts
replace instances of 'a npm' with 'an npm'

add tip "Standalone version of a package"
